title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-4.11 - Reporting Data
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 30-4.11 - Reporting Data

State Regulations

On an annual basis, each LEA shall submit to the
commissioner the ratings for each classroom teacher and building principal on
each applicable teaching and leadership standard, as well as the overall rating
for each teacher and principal, where available, on a form and in a manner
prescribed by the commissioner. Such data shall be collected and used to the
extent necessary to comply with any applicable state and federal statutory
requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
30-4.11

Adopted

New

York State Register March 26, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 12, eff. 3/26/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. On an annual basis, each LEA shall submit to the commissioner the ratings for each classroom teacher and building principal on each applicable teaching and leadership standard, as well as the overall rating for each teacher and principal, where available, on a form and in a manner prescribed by the commissioner. Such data shall be collected and used to the extent necessary to comply with any applicable state and federal statutory requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
30-4.11

Adopted

New York State Register February 19, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 07, eff. 2/3/2025, exp. 4/3/2025
(Emergency)
